IEEE 2024 VGTC VR Awards

The IEEE VGTC Virtual Reality Awards recognize and honor individuals who have made a significant contribution to the community through their research and/or service.

Except for the Outstanding Dissertation Award (whose nominations are due May 31st of each year), all nominations are due by January 18, 2024 11:59 AOE January 15th, 2024. The awards will be presented at the annual IEEE VR conference.

  • Call for NOMINATIONS
  • IEEE VGTC Awards Overview and Criteria

Awards:

  • IEEE VGTC Virtual Reality Dissertation Award

  • IEEE VGTC Virtual Reality Significant New Researcher
    View Award Criteria | View Previous Winners | Submit a Nomination
  • IEEE VGTC Virtual Reality Technical Achievement
    View Award Criteria | View Previous Winners | Submit a Nomination
  • IEEE VGTC Virtual Reality Lifetime Achievement
    View Award Criteria | View Previous Winners | Submit a Nomination
  • IEEE VGTC Virtual Reality Service Award
    View Award Criteria | View Previous Winners | Submit a Nomination
  • IEEE VGTC Virtual Reality Academy
    View Award Criteria | View Previous Winners | Submit a Nomination

For questions or additional information please email IEEE VGTC VR Awards Program Chair, currently Mary Whitton, at vgtc-vr-awards@vgtc.org.
